# Wczytanie danych

```{r DataImport, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}

# Modify global options in R - disable scientific notation
options(scipen = 999)

# Library Import
library("readxl")
library("ggplot2")
library("plotly")
library("dplyr")
library("knitr")
library("DT")
library("readxl")
library("tidyverse")

# Import data from files
wd_indicators <- read_excel("Data\\World_Development_Indicators.xlsx", na=c("", ".."))

```

# Analiza Atrybutów

```{r Analiza, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}

#Data analysis
kable(summary(wd_indicators))

```
